resource_explanation:
El Plano user's events API(event created by user).

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the event creator and attached course.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: The course to which the event is attached. Included in "relationships" category

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Veritatis voluptatem doloribus.","description":"In nobis et. Reiciendis voluptatem ipsam. Quis eius dolorum. Qui beatae minima. Sint corporis ab.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-06","end_at":"2019-08-08","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":2,"type":"course"}}}}}

request_headers.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Suscipit ut eveniet.","description":"Dolor ad repudiandae. Impedit consequatur eaque. Quae distinctio facere. Beatae tempore qui. Rem suscipit et.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-06","end_at":"2019-08-08","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":2,"type":"course"}}}}}
